quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines practiced every day. – Jim Rohn
fact: The word "Checkmate" in chess comes from the Persian phrase "Shah Mat," which means "the king is dead."
joke: What's the difference between a guitar and a fish? You can tune a guitar but you can't "tuna" fish!
